subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: After originally sitting the All-Star second baseman, the Astros reversed course, and Altuve started, went 2 for 4, and won the league batting title at .341.
snippet: After originally sitting the All-Star second baseman, the Astros reversed course, and Altuve started, went 2 for 4, and won the league batting title at .341.
